title: La galerie , Alliance Française de Singapour
blurb: Step into a world where toys become storytellers.
description: Step into a world where toys become storytellers of childhood dreams with Alliance Francaise and MINT Museum of Toys ' new exhibition, Imaginaire: Of Small Memories and Greater Dreams . Join a captivating exhibition that invites visitors to rediscover the world of French childhood through the toys that shaped it across the 20th century. In collaboration with the MINT Museum of Toys, this unique exhibition offers a chronological exploration of how toys reflect the shifting hopes, values, and fantasies of growing up in a changing world. From intricate mechanical creations of the early 1900s to mass-produced plastic icons of the post-war boom, IMAGINAIRE showcases how imagination, innovation, and marketing together transformed toys into powerful vessels of identity, escapism, and creativity. The exhibition is structured around three evolving themes that define the way children dream: Escape from reality : toys that transport children to faraway lands, magical circuses, or even outer space Connection and companionship : plush animals, dolls, and board games that reflect the emotional and social world of play Becoming your own hero : objects that let children see themselves as stars, explorers, or champions of their own story More than just a nostalgic journey, IMAGINAIRE is a cultural reflection on how play helps shape who we are as individuals and societies.
datetime_display: Tuesday to Friday: 1.00 pm - 7.30 pm Saturday: 9.00 am - 6 pm
Keyword_tag: French culture, toys, exhibition, childhood memories, family activities

title: Alliance Française de Singapour Events
blurb: Explore a variety of cultural and educational events.
description: Alliance Française de Singapour hosts a range of events including geopolitical discussions, book fairs, toy campaigns, and French games nights. These events are designed to engage the community with French culture and provide educational opportunities for all ages. Families can enjoy cultural experiences and interactive activities. The events cater to diverse interests, from intellectual discussions to fun-filled game nights, making it a great place for families to explore and learn together. The venue offers a welcoming environment for both adults and children to participate in various activities and events.

title: Alliance Française de Singapour
description: Alliance Française de Singapour hosts a variety of events, including book fairs and geopolitical discussions. The venue provides a space for cultural exchange and learning, offering a range of activities suitable for adults and families interested in French language and culture. The book fair features a selection of French literature and resources, while the geopolitical perspectives series offers insights into global affairs. These events aim to foster intellectual engagement and cultural appreciation within the community. The venue is designed to accommodate diverse audiences and promote a welcoming atmosphere for all attendees.

title: French Games Night
description: French Games Night at Alliance Française de Singapour offers an opportunity to experience French culture through a variety of games. This event is designed to be family-friendly, providing an engaging and interactive environment for both children and adults. Participants can enjoy classic French board games, card games, and other traditional activities that promote language learning and cultural exchange. The games are suitable for all levels of French proficiency, making it accessible for beginners and fluent speakers alike. The event aims to create a fun and educational experience where families can bond and learn about French traditions together. It is an ideal setting for parents to introduce their children to a new language and culture in an enjoyable way.
Keyword_tag: French games, family activities, cultural events, language learning, interactive games

title: Alliance Française de Singapour Venue Details
blurb: Visit us at 1 Sarkies Road for courses and events.
description: Alliance Française de Singapour offers a variety of courses and events. Contact us for more information about our offerings. We are located at 1 Sarkies Road Singapore 258130. You can reach us at +(65) 6737 8422 or via email at info@alliancefrancaise.org.sg or courses@alliancefrancaise.org.sg. Please contact us for pricing details and opening hours. We aim to provide a family-friendly environment for cultural and educational experiences. Our team is dedicated to offering a wide range of activities suitable for all ages. We strive to create a welcoming space for everyone to learn and enjoy French culture. Join us for an enriching experience!
Keyword_tag: French courses, cultural events, language learning, workshops

title: Learn French and Experience French Culture at AF
blurb: French classes and cultural events for all ages!
description: Alliance Française offers French classes to the public with expertise in teaching French in Singapore. They use innovative methodology and materials. Practice your French outside the classroom with cultural events like exhibitions, films, Q&A sessions, workshops with French artisans, concerts, storytelling, and meet-the-author events at la médiathèque. Discover upcoming events and immerse yourself in French culture through various activities and learning opportunities suitable for families and individuals.
Keyword_tag: French classes, cultural events, workshops, exhibitions, language learning

title: Alliance Française de Singapour Cultural Events
blurb: Practise your French outside the classroom!
